phrases.example: She gets along well with her classmates.
Can you look after my cat this weekend?
I need to take care of my little brother.
He wants to be a pilot when he grows up.
He loves making friends with new people.
I ran into my teacher at the supermarket.
My parents are proud of me.
Don't show off your new toys.
Cheer up! Everything will be fine.
Please calm down and tell me what happened.
I look forward to seeing you.
She is afraid of spiders.
I usually get up at 6:00.
Don't stay up late tonight.
Clean your room right away.
The train arrived on time.
We arrived in time for the movie.
Come here at once!
From now on, I will study harder.
Once upon a time, there was a princess.
He is interested in science.
She is good at playing the piano.
Are you going to take part in the race?
I signed up for the cooking class.
Did you have fun at the party?
We got lost in the forest.
We arrived at the station.
They arrived in Taipei yesterday.
The bank is next to the post office.
The park is across from the school.
There is a tree in front of my house.
Go straight and turn left.
The shop is on the corner.
He ate too much and put on weight.
She is exercising to lose weight.
I bought a pair of shoes.
I am looking for my keys.
He applied for a new job.
Don't worry, things will work out.
Please fill out this form.
It depends on the weather.
The wind blew his hat away.
The sky cleared up after the rain.
Watch out! A car is coming.
There are a lot of people here.
Hundreds of birds flew over.
I have a few questions.
Give me a little water.
You should drink at least 8 cups of water.
Add up these numbers.
I will pay for the dinner.
These shoes are on sale.
Sorry, the tickets are sold out.

Turn on the light, please.
Remember to turn off the TV.
Put on your coat; it's cold.
Take off your shoes inside.
Can I try on this shirt?
Mom will pick me up at 5:00.
Don't give up! Keep trying.
Her dream finally came true.
Please keep this rule in mind.
Thanks to your help, we finished it.
We stayed home because of the rain.
I'll have tea instead of coffee.
I like fruit, for example, apples and bananas.
In fact, I don't know him.
Let's get on the bus.
We get off at the next stop.

grammarRules.title: 1. 人稱代名詞 (Subject vs Object)
grammarRules.content:
主格放句首當主詞 (I, You, He, She, They)。
受格放動詞或介系詞後面 (me, you, him, her, them)。
例：He (主格) likes her (受格).

grammarRules.title: 2. Be動詞的用法 (Am / Is / Are)
grammarRules.content:
I am
He/She/It/單數 is
You/We/They/複數 are
否定句直接在 be 後面加 not。

grammarRules.title: 3. 形容詞的位置
grammarRules.content:
1. 放在名詞前面 (a good boy)。
2. 放在 Be 動詞後面 (The boy is good)。

grammarRules.title: 4. 祈使句 (Imperative)
grammarRules.content:
省略主詞 You，直接用原形動詞開頭。
例：Stand up.
否定句用 Don't 開頭。
例：Don't open the door.

grammarRules.title: 5. 有 (There is / There are)
grammarRules.content:
There is + 單數名詞/不可數名詞。
There are + 複數名詞。
問數量用 How many (可數) 或 How much (不可數)。

grammarRules.title: 6. 現在進行式 (Present Continuous)
grammarRules.content:
正在發生的動作。
公式：Be (am/is/are) + V-ing
關鍵字：Look!, Listen!, Now.
例：He is sleeping now.

grammarRules.title: 7. 空間介系詞 (In / On / At...)
grammarRules.content: in (在裡面), on (在上面), at (在...點/位置), under (在下面), next to (在隔壁), between (在兩者之間)。

grammarRules.title: 8. 現在簡單式 (Present Simple)
grammarRules.content:
表示習慣或事實。
重點：主詞是第三人稱單數 (He/She/It) 時，動詞要加 s 或 es。
助動詞用 Does (單數) 或 Do (複數/I/You)。

grammarRules.title: 9. 對等連接詞 (And / But / Or)
grammarRules.content:
and (和；然後), but (但是), or (或者)。
注意：前後詞性要一致 (名詞對名詞，句子對句子)。

grammarRules.title: 10. 頻率副詞 (Always / Often...)
grammarRules.content:
Always > Usually > Often > Sometimes > Seldom > Never
位置口訣：Be 後動前 (在 Be 動詞後面，一般動詞前面)。
例：He is always late. / He always comes late.

grammarRules.title: 11-12. 過去簡單式 (Past Simple)
grammarRules.content:
發生在過去。Be動詞變 was/were。
一般動詞變過去式 (加 ed 或不規則變化)。
助動詞一律用 Did。
關鍵字：Yesterday, Last night, ...ago.

grammarRules.title: 13. 過去進行式 (Past Continuous)
grammarRules.content:
過去某個時間點正在進行。
公式：Was/Were + V-ing
例：I was eating dinner at 7:00 last night.

grammarRules.title: 14. 從屬連接詞 (Because / So)
grammarRules.content:
Because (因為) 和 So (所以) 不能出現在同一個句子裡。
例：Because it rained, we stayed home. (O)
Because it rained, so we stayed home. (X)

grammarRules.title: 15. 動名詞與不定詞 (V-ing / to V)
grammarRules.content:
Enjoy/Practice/Finish + V-ing
Want/Need/Plan + to V
虛主詞用法：It is exciting to play games.

grammarRules.title: 16. 未來式 (Future Tense)
grammarRules.content:
1. Will + 原形動詞
2. Be going to + 原形動詞
例：I will visit Taipei tomorrow.

grammarRules.title: 17. 比較級與最高級
grammarRules.content:
比較級：形容詞+er + than (taller than)
最高級：The + 形容詞+est (the tallest)
長單字：more beautiful / the most beautiful

grammarQuiz.q: My brother _____ to music every night.
grammarQuiz.note: 現在簡單式：主詞 My brother (單數)，動詞加 s。
現在簡單式：主詞 I，動詞用原形。

grammarQuiz.q: Listen! The baby _____ in the room.
grammarQuiz.note: 現在進行式：Listen! 表示正在發生 (is + V-ing)。
現在進行式：They 搭配 are。
過去簡單式：時間是 yesterday，助動詞用 Did。
過去簡單式：last Sunday，動詞用過去式 had。

grammarQuiz.q: He was watching TV when I _____ home.
grammarQuiz.note: 過去進行式搭配：當我「回家(瞬間-過去式)」時，他正在看電視。
特殊動詞：enjoy 後面必接 V-ing。
特殊動詞：want 後面接不定詞 (to V)。
虛主詞用法：It is + adj + to V。
介系詞 (for) 後面遇動詞改 V-ing。
疑問詞：money 不可數，用 How much。

grammarQuiz.q: There _____ many students in the classroom.
grammarQuiz.note: 存在句：students 是複數，用 There are。

grammarQuiz.q: There _____ some water in the bottle.
grammarQuiz.note: 存在句：water 不可數，視為單數，用 There is。
助動詞：John 是第三人稱單數，問句用 Does。
祈使句：Don't 後面接原形動詞。
祈使句：形容詞 (quiet) 前面要用 Be 開頭。
比較級：有 than (比)，用 taller。

grammarQuiz.q: This is the _____ book in the world.
grammarQuiz.note: 最高級：the + best (good的最高級)。

grammarQuiz.q: Elephant is the _____ animal in the zoo.
grammarQuiz.note: 最高級：biggest (重複字尾加 est)。
花費：物品(The pen)當主詞，用 cost。
花費：spend + 時間 + V-ing。

grammarQuiz.q: It _____ me 30 minutes to cook dinner.
grammarQuiz.note: 花費：It (虛主詞) 只能搭配 took (花時間)。
片語：be good at (擅長)。
時間介系詞：特定日期/星期用 on。
時間介系詞：月份/年份/季節用 in。
時間介系詞：幾點幾分用 at。

grammarQuiz.q: Look at the bird _____ the tree.
grammarQuiz.note: 空間介系詞：躲在樹冠裡面用 in the tree (長在樹上的果實用 on)。
頻率副詞：放在 Be 動詞後面 (is never)。
頻率副詞：放在一般動詞 (play) 前面。

grammarQuiz.q: Because he was sick, _____ he didn't go to school.
grammarQuiz.note: 連接詞：Because 和 So 不能同時出現。

grammarQuiz.q: Although it rained, _____ we went out.
grammarQuiz.note: 連接詞：Although 和 But 不能同時出現。
代名詞：介系詞 (to) 後面接受格 (him)。
名詞：顏色當主詞，前面不加冠詞。
數量詞：疑問句通常用 any。
例外：邀請或請求時，雖是問句但用 some。
數量詞：friends 可數，用 a few (一些)。

grammarQuiz.q: There is _____ water in the glass.
grammarQuiz.note: 數量詞：water 不可數，little 表示「幾乎沒有」。
片語：be interested in (感興趣)。
片語：look forward to + V-ing (to 是介系詞)。
祈使句：Let's 後面接原形動詞。
建議：How about + V-ing？

grammarQuiz.q: I will _____ visit my grandma tomorrow.
grammarQuiz.note: 未來式：will 後面直接接原形動詞 (visit)。

grammarQuiz.q: She _____ going to buy a car.
grammarQuiz.note: 未來式：Be (is) going to。

grammarQuiz.q: The tea is too hot _____ drink.
grammarQuiz.note: 句型：too... to... (太...而不能...)。

grammarQuiz.q: The bag is _____ heavy that I can't lift it.
grammarQuiz.note: 句型：so... that... (如此...以至於...)。

grammarQuiz.q: One of the _____ is my brother.
grammarQuiz.note: 句型：One of + 複數名詞 (其中之一)。
數量詞：Both (兩者都) 視為複數，用 are。
數量詞：Neither (兩者皆非) 視為單數，用 is。
代名詞：Everyone 視為單數，用 was (過去式)。
動詞用法：Stop + V-ing (停止做某事)。
動詞用法：Stop + to V (停下來為了去做某事)。

grammarQuiz.q: Remember _____ the door when you leave.
grammarQuiz.note: 動詞用法：Remember to V (記得要去做)。
動詞用法：Remember V-ing (記得曾經做過)。
易混淆字：cook 是廚師，cooker 是炊具。
連綴動詞：look 後面接形容詞。
連綴動詞：taste 後面接形容詞。
副詞：fast 的副詞也是 fast (沒有 fastly)。
副詞：修飾動詞 sings，用副詞 well。
變化：get + 比較級 (變得越來越...)。

grammarQuiz.q: Which do you like _____, tea or coffee?
grammarQuiz.note: 比較：兩者選擇，用比較級 better。
片語：have to (必須) + 原形動詞。

grammarQuiz.q: You _____ be quiet in the library.
grammarQuiz.note: 助動詞：must (必須/務必)。
單字辨析：跟別人借入用 borrow。
單字辨析：借給別人用 lend。
慣用語：Keep the change (不用找零了)。
天氣：It is raining (正在下雨)。

grammarQuiz.q: We have a lot of _____ in summer.
grammarQuiz.note: 名詞：rain (雨水) 不可數。
度量：問長度用 How long。
度量：問山的高度用 How high。
度量：問身高用 tall。
慣用語：What's the matter with you?
片語：be afraid of (害怕)。
片語：be proud of (以...為榮)。
片語：be famous for (以...聞名)。
片語：wait for (等待)。
片語：listen to (聆聽)。
片語：look at (看著)。

grammarQuiz.q: I usually go to school _____ bus.
grammarQuiz.note: 交通：by + 交通工具 (不加冠詞)。
交通：on foot (走路)。
片語：give up (放棄)。
片語：turn on (打開電器)。
片語：take off (脫下)。

grammarQuiz.q: I will pick you _____ at the station.
grammarQuiz.note: 片語：pick up (接送)。
片語：on time (準時)。
片語：fill out (填寫表格)。
片語：belong to (屬於)。
片語：be ready to + V (準備好做...)。

grammarQuiz.q: Let's take a break _____ ten minutes.
grammarQuiz.note: 時間：for + 一段時間。
完成式：since + 過去時間點 (自從...)。
完成式：has never been to (從未去過)。
完成式：yet 用於疑問句或否定句句尾。

grammarQuiz.q: The man _____ came here yesterday is my uncle.
grammarQuiz.note: 關代：先行詞是人 (The man)，主格用 who。

grammarQuiz.q: The dog _____ has a long tail is cute.
grammarQuiz.note: 關代：先行詞是物/動物 (The dog)，用 which。

grammarQuiz.q: I know the girl _____ father is a doctor.
grammarQuiz.note: 關代：所有格 (她的爸爸)，用 whose。

grammarQuiz.q: This is the place _____ I was born.
grammarQuiz.note: 關代：先行詞是地點且表示「在那裡」，用 where。
名詞子句：why (為什麼)。
名詞片語：what to do (該做什麼)。
名詞子句：who he is (他是誰)。
名詞：News (新聞) 形式像複數，但視為不可數(單數)。
